Module se1.bestellsystem
Package application

Class Application_D1

java.lang.Object
application.Application_D1
public class Application_D1
extends java.lang.Object
Runnable application class that creates and outputs simple orders using the datamodel. "se1.bestellsystem".
Version:
"1.0.0-SNAPSHOT_D1"
Author:
"Khatia Zitanishvili"

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Public main() function.
      Parameters:
      args - arguments passed from command line.

    • print

      public <T> java.lang.StringBuffer print​(java.lang.StringBuffer sb, java.util.Collection<T> collection, java.util.function.Function<java.util.stream.Stream<T>,​java.util.stream.Stream<T>> stream, java.util.function.Consumer<T> printEach)
      Generic print method for collection of elements of type T that offers a stream callout before print to filter, sort, map the stream before each element is printed by invoking the printEach functional interface. 
       Example of Customer list sorted by name:
 | 643270 | Bayer, Anne              | anne24@yahoo.de, (030) 3481-23352   |
 | 412396 | Blumenfeld, Nadine-Ulla  | +49 152-92454                       |
 | 892474 | Meyer, Eric              | eric98@yahoo.com, (030) 3945-642298 |
      Type Parameters:
      T - generic element type of stream to be printed.
      Parameters:
      sb - StringBuffer that will contains the formatted result. A new StringBuffer is created when sb is null.
      collection - elements to be streamed and printed.
      stream - callout to filter, sort, etc. Stream<T> before each element t is printed.
      printEach - functional interface to print each element t into StringBuffer.
      Returns:
      StringBuffer that contains formatted result (same sb).

    • printCustomers

      public java.lang.StringBuffer printCustomers​(java.lang.StringBuffer sb, java.util.Collection<Customer> customers)
      Print collection of Customer objects into StringBuffer as lines with Customer attributes. 
       Example:
 | 643270 | Bayer, Anne              | anne24@yahoo.de, (030) 3481-23352   |
 | 412396 | Blumenfeld, Nadine-Ulla  | +49 152-92454                       |
 | 892474 | Meyer, Eric              | eric98@yahoo.com, (030) 3945-642298 |
      Parameters:
      sb - StringBuffer that will contains the formatted result. A new StringBuffer is created when sb is null.
      customers - collection of Customers (null argument is ignored).
      Returns:
      StringBuffer that contains formatted result (same sb).

    • printCustomer

      public java.lang.StringBuffer printCustomer​(java.lang.StringBuffer sb, Customer c)
      Print attributes of one Customer object into StringBuffer as column-separated line. 
       Example:
 | 892474 | Meyer, Eric                    | eric98@yahoo.com, (030) 3945-642298          |
      Parameters:
      sb - StringBuffer that will contains the formatted result. A new StringBuffer is created when sb is null.
      c - Customer object.
      Returns:
      StringBuffer that contains formatted result (same sb).

    • fmtName

      public java.lang.String fmtName​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, int... style)
      Format Customer name according to a style (0 is default): 
       style: 0: "Meyer, Eric"  10: "MEYER, ERIC"  20: "E.M."
        1: "Meyer, E."    11: "MEYER, E."    21: "E."
        2: "Eric Meyer"   12: "ERIC MEYER"   22: "M."
        3: "E. Meyer"     13: "E. MEYER"
        4: "Eric M."      14: "ERIC M."
        5: "Eric"         15: "ERIC"
        6: "Meyer"        16: "MEYER"
      Parameters:
      firstName - first name, may be null or "".
      lastName - last name, may be null or "".
      style - name formatting style.
      Returns:
      formatted name according to style.

    • printArticles

      public java.lang.StringBuffer printArticles​(java.lang.StringBuffer sb, java.util.Collection<Article> articles)
      Print collection of Article objects into StringBuffer as lines with Article attributes. 
       Example:
 | SKU-458362 | Tasse                      |    299 �|  19% MwSt|
 | SKU-693856 | Becher                     |    149 �|  19% MwSt|
 | SKU-278530 | Buch "Java"                |   4990 �|   7% MwSt|
      Parameters:
      sb - StringBuffer that will contains the formatted result. A new StringBuffer is created when sb is null.
      articles - collection of Articles (null argument is ignored).
      Returns:
      StringBuffer that contains formatted result (same sb).

    • printOrders

      public java.lang.StringBuffer printOrders​(java.lang.StringBuffer sb, java.util.Collection<Order> orders)
      Print collection of Order objects into StringBuffer as lines with Order attributes. 
       Example:
 | 8592356245 | Meyer, Eric                | 4 items | created: 2022-05-16 08:16:42 |
 | 3563561357 | Bayer, Anne                | 2 items | created: 2022-05-16 08:16:42 |
 | 5234968294 | Meyer, Eric                | 1 items | created: 2022-05-16 08:16:42 |
 | 6135735635 | Blumenfeld, Nadine-Ulla    | 3 items | created: 2022-05-16 08:16:42 |
      Parameters:
      sb - StringBuffer that will contains the formatted result. A new StringBuffer is created when sb is null.
      orders - collection of Orders (null argument is ignored).
      Returns:
      StringBuffer that contains formatted result (same sb).
